Name: Together as One!
Description: Elite Shout. (3...13...15 seconds.) All party members near you or your pet deal +5...13...15 damage and gain +1...6...7 Health regeneration. PvE Skill

Name: Antidote Signet
Description: Signet. Remove Poison

Name: Apply Poison
Description: Preparation. (24 seconds.) Your physical attacks inflict Poisoned condition (3...13...15 seconds).

Name: Barbed Trap
Description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 7...20...23 piercing damage. Inflicts Crippled and Bleeding conditions (3...21...25 seconds). Easily interrupted.

Name: Barrage
Description: Elite Bow Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Hits 5 foes adjacent to your target. All your preparations are removed.

Name: Call of Haste
Description: Shout. (30 seconds.) Your pet moves and attacks 33% faster.

Name: Call of Haste (PvP)
Description: Shout. (30 seconds.) Your pet moves and attacks 25% faster.

Name: Called Shot
Description: Bow Attack. You shoot an arrow that moves 3 times faster. Unblockable.

Name: Charm Animal
Description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed
Energy: your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. You cannot charm an animal that is more than 4 levels above you.

Name: Charm Animal (Codex)
Description: Skill. Your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. Failure unless Beast Mastery 8 or higher.

Name: Choking Gas
Description: Preparation. (1...10...12 seconds.) +1...7...8 damage. Spreads Choking Gas to foes adjacent to target. Choking Gas interrupts spells.

Name: Comfort Animal
Description: Skill. Your pet gains 20...87...104 Health. Resurrects your pet (10...48...58% Health.) If you have Comfort Animal equipped
Energy: your animal companion will travel with you.

Name: Comfort Animal (PvP)
Description: Skill. Your pet gains 20...87...104 Health. Resurrects your pet (10...48...58% Health.)

Name: Concussion Shot
Description: Bow Attack. Interrupts a spell. Interruption effect: inflicts Dazed condition (5...17...20 seconds). Hits for only 1...13...16 damage.

Name: Debilitating Shot
Description: Bow Attack. Causes 1...8...10 Energy loss.

Name: Determined Shot
Description: Bow Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Recharges your attack skills if it fails to hit.

Name: Disrupting Lunge
Description: Pet Attack. Deals +1...10...12 damage. Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

Name: Distracting Shot
Description: Bow Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds. Hits for only 1...13...16 damage.

Name: Dual Shot
Description: Bow Attack. You shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal 25% less damage

Name: Energizing Wind
Description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...5...6 spirit (1...25...31 second[s] lifespan). Skills cost 15 less energy (minimum cost 10 energy) and recharge 25% slower for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Name: Escape
Description: Elite Stance. (1...7...8 second[s].) You move 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

Name: Escape (PvP)
Description: Elite Stance. (1...7...8 second[s].) You move 33% faster and have 75% chance to block. Ends if you make a melee attack.

Name: Favorable Winds
Description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Arrows move twice as fast and hit for +6 damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Name: Ferocious Strike
Description: Elite Pet Attack. Deals +13...25...28 damage. You gain adrenaline and 3...9...10 energy.

Name: Flame Trap
Description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5...17...20 fire damage every second (3 seconds). Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 second[s]). Easily interrupted.

Name: Hunter's Shot
Description: Bow Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (3...21...25 seconds) if your target is hit.

Name: Kindle Arrows
Description: Preparation. (24 seconds.) +3...20...24 fire damage. Your arrows deal fire damage.

Name: Lightning Reflexes
Description: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

Name: Lightning Reflexes (PvP)
Description: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

Name: Maiming Strike
Description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...13...15 seconds) if target foe is moving.

Name: Nature's Renewal
Description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). For creatures in range
Energy: enchantments and Hexes take twice as long to cast and it costs twice as much Energy to maintain enchantments. Does not affect spirits.

Name: Pin Down
Description: Bow Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...13...15 seconds).

Name: Power Shot
Description: Bow Attack. Target foe takes 25...45...50 damage.

Name: Precision Shot
Description: Bow Attack. Deals +3...9...10 damage. Unblockable. Easily Interrupted.

Name: Primal Echoes
Description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Signets cost 10 energy for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Name: Quick Shot
Description: Elite Bow Attack. You shoot an arrow that moves twice as fast.

Name: Quickening Zephyr
Description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (15...39...45 second lifespan). Skills cost 30% more Energy and recharge twice as fast for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Name: Read the Wind
Description: Preparation. (24 seconds). +3...9...10 damage. Your arrows move twice as fast.

Name: Read the Wind (PvP)
Description: Preparation. (24 seconds). Your arrows move twice as fast.

Name: Savage Shot
Description: Bow Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: deals +13...25...28 damage if action was a spell.

Name: Scavenger Strike
Description: Pet Attack. Deals +10...22...25 damage. You gain 3...13...15 Energy if target foe has a condition.

Name: Spike Trap
Description: Elite Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Every second
Attribute: and inflicts Crippled condition (3...21...25 seconds). Easily interrupted.

Name: Storm Chaser
Description: Stance. (8...18...20 seconds.) You move 25% faster and gain 1...4...5 Energy whenever you take elemental damage.

Name: Throw Dirt
Description: Touch Skill. Inflicts Blindness condition (3...13...15 seconds). Also affects foes adjacent to target foe.

Name: Troll Unguent
Description: Skill. (13 seconds.) You have +3...9...10 Health regeneration.

Name: Whirling Defense
Description: Stance. (8...18...20 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Deals 5...10...11 damage to adjacent foes whenever you block a projectile attack.

Name: Winnowing
Description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Increases physical damage by +4 for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.
